push_full3v.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !     Full 3v particle pusher (Boris rotation scheme)
00004 !
00005 !  TM fields only (s-pol):  (Ex,0,Ez)  (0,By,0)
00006 !  TE fields  (0,Ey,0) (Bx,0,Bz)
00007 !  ==============================================
00008 
00009 
00010 subroutine push_full3v(p_start,p_finish,dts)
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   implicit none
00014   integer, intent(in) :: p_start, p_finish
00015   real, intent(in) :: dts
00016   integer :: p
00017   real :: beta, gam2,gam1,tt, sx, sy, sz, tz, ty, tx
00018   real :: uxd, uyd, uzd, uyp, uzp, uxp, uxm, uym, uzm
00019   real :: exi, eyi, ezi, bxi, byi, bzi
00020   real :: phipon, ez_em, bx_em, by_em, az_em, xd, yd, zd
00021 
00022 
00023   if (itime>0 .and. beam_config==4) focus(1) = x_crit  ! laser tracks n_c
00024 
00025   do p = p_start, p_finish
00026      beta=q(p)/m(p)*dts*0.5  ! charge/mass constant
00027 
00028      xd = x(p)-focus(1)
00029      yd = y(p)-focus(2)
00030      zd = z(p)-focus(3)
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034      exi = ex(p)
00035      eyi = ey(p)
00036      ezi = ez(p)
00037      bxi = bx(p)
00038      byi = by(p)
00039      bzi = bz(p)
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043      !   first half-accn
00044      uxm = ux(p) + beta*exi
00045      uym = uy(p) + beta*eyi
00046      uzm = uz(p) + beta*ezi
00047 
00048      !   rotation
00049      gam1=dsqrt(1.d0 + uxm**2 + uym**2 + uzm**2)
00050 
00051      tx = beta*bxi/gam1
00052      ty = beta*byi/gam1
00053      tz = beta*bzi/gam1
00054      tt = 1.0 + tx**2 + ty**2 + tz**2
00055 
00056      sx = 2.0*tx/tt
00057      sy = 2.0*ty/tt
00058      sz = 2.0*tz/tt
00059 
00060      uxd = uxm + uym*tz - uzm*ty
00061      uyd = uym + uzm*tx - uxm*tz
00062      uzd = uzm + uxm*ty - uym*tx
00063 
00064      uxp = uxm + uyd*sz - uzd*sy
00065      uyp = uym + uzd*sx - uxd*sz
00066      uzp = uzm + uxd*sy - uyd*sx
00067 
00068      !   second half-accn
00069      ux(p) = uxp + beta*exi
00070      uy(p) = uyp + beta*eyi
00071      uz(p) = uzp + beta*ezi
00072 
00073   end do
00074 
00075 
00076 end subroutine push_full3v
